properties.description: The church is opening specially and we will provide hot drinks and biscuits in a warm, comfortable and inviting space where people can gather and have a good chat. Volunteers will be on hand to make drinks and chat to people.There will also be books and jigsaws available if people would rather be doing something.
properties.title: Christ Church, Silloth

properties.description: A warm welcoming family run pub, fully heated , friendly conversation, board games, quiet space, dog friendly
properties.title: Kings Arms, Bowness on Solway

properties.description: Quiet space, open every day during daylight hours, help yourself kitchen, no staff, with Thursday lunchtimes addition of heating & staff.
properties.title: Port Carlisle Community Chapel

properties.description: Community volunteer based, friendly environment, Chapel opening specifically for warm space.
properties.title: Portcarlisle Methodist Church, Portcarlisle Nr Wigton

properties.description: Community building used by local groups throughout the week. You will be able to find out what other activities are available when you visit the Community Hall.
